title: Kaiyil Mithakkum Song Lyrics Ratchagan
stanzas:
kaiyyil midhakkum kanavaa ne
kaikaal mulaitha kaatraa ne
kayyil yendhiyum kanakavillaye
nuraiyal seitha silaiyaa nee

ippadi unnai yaendhi kondu
indhira logam poivida vaa
idaiyil konjam vali eduthaalum
chandhira tharaiyil
paaiyidaa

kaiyyil midhakkum kanavaa ne
kaikaal mulaitha kaatraa ne
kayyil yendhiyum kanakavillaye
nuraiyal seitha silaiyaa nee

nilavil porulgal edai ilakkum
neerilum porul edai ilakkum
kadhalil kooda edai ilakkum
indru kandenadi
adhai kandu kondenadi (2)

kadhal thaaimai irandu mattum
baaram enbadhai ariyaadhu
un palingu mugathai
paarthu kondaal pasiyo
valiyo theriyaadhu (2)

unnai mattum sumandhu nadanthaal
uyaram thooram theriyaadhu(2)
unmel vandhoru oru
poo vilundhaal ennaal
thaanga mudiyaadhu.

kaiyyil midhakkum kanavaa ne
kaikaal mulaitha kaatraa ne
kayyil yendhiyum kanakavillaye
nuraiyal seitha silaiyaa nee (2)
